o4G5jWyVFGbgtz0kvnxqJQ.review_text: It took a trip to San Francisco to shake the dust of my Yelp boots.  The Beer Olympics is a really good way to meet new people.  You can come with friends on a team, or even be put on a team with different open-minded people, often who are traveling.  As one who is always trying to keep costs down, the fact that they have $2 beer makes this an experience to remember (or forget, depending on how much you take advantage!)  I haven't met so many people from different countries (ie Australia, Sweden, UK, South America) since I was in Ibiza.
